mentions.tacticalSituation: No Conservative has been elected in Manchester for 18 years. The Conservatives can't win here in south Manchester.

leaflet.personalStatement: John Leech says: 'Every extra garden poster we put up wins us more votes. Thank you for your support.'

images.caption: John Leech inviting constituents to put up a garden poster to support his campaign.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet is primarily focused on encouraging constituents to display garden posters and appears to be designed to show the local support and voting statistics that suggest a tactical voting situation where the Conservatives are unlikely to win.
